TopicTitle: No connection Realism Overhaul => What the hell is this ?

Articles.Content: I get tthis when trying to lunch, it says no connection. What am I doing wrong.

It's a mod called remotetech that comes as part of realism overhaul, you can't operate unmanned craft without antenna,

there should be some new antennas available including one short range antenna that can be used during launch without the need to deploy it.

I added aaantena it still says no cconnection to send command on. Also i cannot throttle.

I added aaantena it still says no cconnection to send command on. Also i cannot throttle.

Edited January 22, 2015 by cosmos33

I added aaantena it still says no cconnection to send command on. Also i cannot throttle.

Changing the throttle is a command that requires an antenna

which one did you put on?

because most require deploying before they work, it's been a while since I used remotetech but there should be one that's always on and wont get destroyed during flight.

That one is used for the launch then you will have to change to a longer range antenna in space, also keep in mind that without a satellite relay network you will lose control on the backside of the planet.

EDIT thanks for the pic, not too sure about that particular antenna but it looks like it isn't deployed, did you try the activate button?

Edited January 22, 2015 by MartGonzo

Sometimes the RSS Remotetech Settings file doesn't get selected in CKAN (or, if you installed manually, sometimes peopel miss the link).

Download this file and place it in the RemoteTech folder ( KSP/GameData/RemoteTech/ ) and choose to overwrite.
All this is is using an antenna that is not activated, and that particular one cannot be activated in atmosphere.
Updating with the file Nathan provided seems to have worked ! THX
